#### Tender Overview
=================================================================

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide remediation services at Mullins Point, located on Mullins Point Road, North Wallace, Nova Scotia, under Supply Arrangement EB218-210758. The contract is for a remedy solution to restore the area.

====================================

* Competitive bidding process
* Lowest price proposal selection criterion
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) compliant
* Deliverables: remediation services
